mapper.select: SELECT e.exam_id, e.exam_nm, e.exam_state, e.exam_date, e.lidx_id, NVL(es.es_fscore, 0) es_fscore, NVL(es.es_lscore, 0) es_lscore FROM exam e LEFT OUTER JOIN examscore es ON(e.exam_id = es.exam_id) WHERE e.exam_id = #{examId} AND es.user_id = ${userId}

SELECT e.*, NVL(es.es_fscore, 999) es_fscore, NVL(es.es_lscore, 999) es_lscore, NVL(es.es_fscore, 999) search_EsScore FROM exam e LEFT OUTER JOIN examscore es ON(e.exam_id = es.exam_id) WHERE e.les_id = #{lesId} AND es.user_id = ${userId}
